summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Krystal Magic World uPVC website. Backend API testing: 100% pass rate (27/27 tests). Frontend testing: All major pages, navigation, lead forms, and integrations working correctly. One minor routing issue found with service area pages.

integration_issues.issue: Route /upvc-windows-in-gurugram not matching - React Router shows 'No routes matched location'. Page loads header/footer but main content is blank.
integration_issues.note: API endpoint /api/cities/gurugram works correctly (returns 200). Issue is in React Router configuration or ServiceAreaPage component rendering.

passed_tests: Backend: All 27 API endpoints (health, leads CRUD, products, projects, blog, FAQs, testimonials, cities, design studio, downloads, settings, sitemap)
Frontend: Homepage loads with hero, trust strip, product gateways, features, process timeline, projects, testimonials, FAQs
Navigation: Header with dropdowns for Company, Windows, Doors, Resources visible and functional
Quote Modal: Multi-step form (3 steps) opens, accepts input, and submits successfully to /api/leads
Contact Page: Multi-step lead form (4 steps) works correctly with all field types and submits successfully
Product Pages: /products/windows and /products/doors load correctly with product listings
Product Detail: /products/casement-windows loads with full product information
Design Studio: Page loads with design options
Projects Page: Displays project case studies
FAQs Page: Displays FAQ items with accordion functionality
About Page: Company information page loads
Book Site Visit Button: Links to contact page correctly
Lead Form Submissions: Both quote modal and contact page forms successfully create leads in MongoDB
Mobile Responsive: Sticky CTA bar present
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix service area page routing issue: /upvc-windows-in-:city and /upvc-doors-in-:city routes not matching. React Router shows 'No routes matched location'. Check ServiceAreaPage component and route configuration in App.js.
